attributes.action: Investigate claims made during the EU referendum by vote leave
attributes.additional_details: Vote leave claimed amongst othet things that we pay to the EU 350 millions per week and that if we leaved the 350 millions would be spend in the NHS , the other big claim was that the EU is run by unelected burocrats and we elected our MEP in the UK. I demand that if the independent assessment established that these claims were false than the result of the referendum will be disregarded
attributes.background:
During the EU referendum Vote Leave has deliberately made false claims and deceived millions of people.
I demand that an independent assessment is carried out on the Vote  Leave campaign claims and that the perpetrators if found guilty will be brought to justice
